A '''baked potato brick wall''' is a [[baked potato brick]] variant of a [[wall]], only present in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Baked Potato Brick Wall|Hoe|Wood|horizontal=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Baked potato brick walls generate naturally in [[colosseum]]s.
